Configuration.Substitution: You also have AppSense installed which has been known to add the Boot key into the registry.

Rule.Name: sLocalAutodXml
Rule.Title: A local Autodiscover xml file was detected in the registry
Rule.Text: A path to an Autodiscover xml file was detected in the registry under HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Office\%MAJORVERSION%.0\Outlook\AutoDiscover. This Autodiscover xml file will be used in some situations by Outlook to determine the Autodiscover settings for the profile{0}

Rule.Name: sExcludeHttpRedirectOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Possible mailbox connection issues due to the 'ExcludeHttpRedirect' registry value
Rule.Text:
ExcludeHttpRedirect ={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover.
Click the 'Click here ...' link for details on this setting.

Rule.Name: sExcludeHttpsAutodiscoverDomainOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Possible mailbox connection issues due to the 'ExcludeHttpsAutodiscoverDomain' registry value
Rule.Text:
ExcludeHttpsAutodiscoverDomain ={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover.
Click the 'Click here ...' link for details on this setting.

Rule.Name: sExcludeHttpsRootDomainOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Possible mailbox connection issues due to the 'ExcludeHttpsRootDomain' registry value
Rule.Text:
ExcludeHttpsRootDomain ={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover.
Click the 'Click here ...' link for details on this setting.

Rule.Name: sExcludeScpLookupOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Possible mailbox connection issues due to the 'ExcludeScpLookup' registry value
Rule.Text:
ExcludeScpLookup ={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover.
Click the 'Click here ...' link for details on this setting.

Rule.Name: sExcludeSrvLookupOfflineScan
Rule.Title: The unused 'ExcludeSrvLookup' registry value was detected
Rule.Text:
ExcludeSrvLookup ={0} in the registry. The 'ExcludeSrvLookup' value is never used by Outlook.
Click the 'Click here ...' link for details on this setting

Rule.Name: sExcludeSrvRecordOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Possible mailbox connection issues due to the 'ExcludeSrvRecord' registry value
Rule.Text:
ExcludeSrvRecord ={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover.
Click the 'Click here ...' link for details on this setting.

Rule.Name: sPreferLocalXMLOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Possible mailbox connection issues due to the 'PreferLocalXML' registry value
Rule.Text:
PreferLocalXML={0} in the registry. Check with your administrator to make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover.
Click the 'Click here ...' link for details on this setting.

Rule.Name: sPreferLocalXMLOfflineScanCloud
Rule.Title: Possible mailbox connection issues due to the 'PreferLocalXML' registry value
Rule.Text:
PreferLocalXML={0} in the registry. This configuration may cause problems with Office 365 mailboxes. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover.
Click the 'Click here ...' link for details on this setting.

Rule.Name: sExcludeLastKnownGoodUrlOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Possible mailbox connection issues due to the 'ExcludeLastKnownGoodUrl' registry value
Rule.Text:
The ExcludeLastKnownGoodUrl value is set to 1 in the registry. This configuration may impact the time it takes for Outlook to retrieve Autodiscover information from your Exchange server.
Click the 'Click here ...' link for details on this setting.

Rule.Name: sBootKeyOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Autodiscover and Outlook features (free/busy, OAB, and MailTips) may not function
Rule.Text:
The 'Boot' key was found in the registry under HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Office\{2}.0\Outlook\AutoDiscover\. This configuration can cause the failure of Autodiscover and Outlook features such as free/busy, OAB, and MailTips that use Autodiscover. {0}
Click the 'Click here ...' link for steps to remove this registry key.
Rule.Symptoms: Autodiscover,Exchange connection,Free Busy,MailTips,Offline Address Book (OAB),Outlook profile

Rule.Name: sNonDefaultRedirectServersOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Possible problems due to non-default values specified under \RedirectServers
Rule.Text:
Non-default server entries found under the 'HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Office\{2}.0\Outlook\AutoDiscover\RedirectServers' key.
Please check with your administrator to make sure this is a desired configuration.

Rule.Text:
ExcludeSrvLookup ={0} as a group policy setting. The 'ExcludeSrvLookup' value is never used by Outlook.

Rule.Text:
ExcludeSrvRecord ={0} in the registry as a policy setting. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover.

Rule.Name: sPreferLocalXMLPolicyOfflineScan

Rule.Text:
PreferLocalXML={0} in the registry as a policy setting. Check with your administrator to make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover.

Rule.Name: sPreferLocalXMLPolicyOfflineScanCloud
Rule.Title: Possible mailbox connection issues due to the 'PreferLocalXML' group policy value
Rule.Text:
PreferLocalXML={0} in the registry as a policy setting. This configuration may cause problems with Office 365 mailboxes. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover.

Rule.Name: sExcludeLastKnownGoodUrlPolOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Possible mailbox connection issues due to the 'ExcludeLastKnownGoodUrl' group policy value
Rule.Text:
The ExcludeLastKnownGoodUrl value is set to 1 in the \Policies section of the registry. This configuration may impact the time it takes for Outlook to retrieve Autodiscover information from your Exchange server.

Rule.Name: sNonDefaultRedirectServersPolOfflineScan
Rule.Title: Possible problems due to non-default group policy values specified under \RedirectServers
Rule.Text:
Non-default server entries found under the 'HKCU\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Office\{2}.0\Outlook\AutoDiscover\RedirectServers' key.
Please check with your administrator to make sure this is a desired configuration.

Rule.Name: sLocalAutodXmlFull
Rule.Title: A local autodiscover xml file was detected in the registry
Rule.Text: A path to an autodiscover xml file was detected in the registry under HKCU\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Office\%MAJORVERSION%.0\Outlook\AutoDiscover. This autodiscover xml file will be used in some situations by Outlook to determine the Autodiscover settings for the profile{0}

Rule.Name: sExcludeHttpRedirect
Rule.Title: Possible problems due to the 'ExcludeHttpRedirect' registry value
Rule.Text: ExcludeHttpRedirect ={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover as it can cause unexpected mailbox connection problems.

Rule.Name: sExcludeHttpsAutodiscoverDomain
Rule.Title: Possible problems due to the 'ExcludeHttpsAutodiscoverDomain' registry value
Rule.Text: ExcludeHttpsAutodiscoverDomain ={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover as it can cause unexpected mailbox connection problems.

Rule.Text: ExcludeHttpsRootDomain ={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover as it can cause unexpected mailbox connection problems.

Rule.Text: ExcludeScpLookup ={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover as it can cause unexpected mailbox connection problems.

Rule.Name: sExcludeSrvLookup

Rule.Text: ExcludeSrvLookup ={0} in the registry. However, the 'ExcludeSrvLookup' value is never used by Outlook.

Rule.Name: sExcludeSrvRecord
Rule.Title: Possible problems due to the 'ExcludeSrvRecord' registry value
Rule.Text: ExcludeSrvRecord ={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover as it can cause unexpected mailbox connection problems.

Rule.Name: sPreferLocalXML

Rule.Text: PreferLocalXML={0} in the registry. Please make sure this is a desired configuration for Autodiscover as it can cause unexpected mailbox connection problems.

Rule.Name: sPreferLocalXMLO365
Rule.Title: Possible problems due to the 'PreferLocalXML' registry value
Rule.Text: The 'PreferLocalXML' value was found in the registry. This value is used by Autodiscover, and it can cause problems when your mailbox is on Office 365. Please check with your administrator to make sure this is a desired configuration.

Rule.Name: sExcludeLastKnownGoodUrl
Rule.Title: Possible problems due to the 'ExcludeLastKnownGoodUrl' registry value
Rule.Text: The 'ExcludeLastKnownGoodUrl' value is set to 1 in the registry. This configuration may impact the time it takes for Outlook to retrieve Autodiscover information from your Exchange server.

Rule.Name: sBootKeyFullScan
Rule.Title: Autodiscover, free/busy, OAB, and MailTips fail due to bad registry data
Rule.Text: The 'Boot' key was found in the registry under HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Office\{2}.0\Outlook\AutoDiscover\. This configuration can cause the failure of Autodiscover and Outlook features such as free/busy, OAB, and MailTips that use Autodiscover. {0}
